c74object.name: hoa.2d.exchanger~
c74object.description: hoa.2d.exchanger~ renumbers and normalizes the channels.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: decomposition-order
objarg.description: First argument is the ambisonic order of decomposition.

objarg.name: normalisation
objarg.description: numbering format can be "toMaxN", "fromMaxN". Numbering and Normalisation args can be combined into a single as follows : "toBFormat" (aka. toFurseMalham toMaxN), "fromBFormat" (aka. fromFurseMalham fromMaxN).

c74object.discussion: The library default normalization is SN3D and the numbering is ACN (cf tutorials). The exchangers will always convert from or to the standard. The exchanger can take one or two arguments for the numbering and the normalization. for further information click here
